group_1.narration: Thanks to Yozuru's help, I got my confidence back, @and I wasn't making stupid mistakes like before...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, when you cut up the chocolate, @steady your hand on the knife.

group_1.textRight: ...Like this?

group_1.textLeft: Yep, you got it!

group_1.narration: I was able to make the cake, @with more than enough time to spare @to teach Yozuru some extra tricks...

group_1.textLeft: Their cakes look so delicious!

group_1.textRight: That’s to be expected. After all, that girl was @the Sweets Contest Champion!

group_1.textLeft: (That’s right... I've been keeping Manaka's @teachings in mind!)

group_1.textRight: It's going well.

group_1.textLeft: Yes! We did it!

group_1.textRight: Excellent job.
You piped on the finishing touches flawlessly.
I can't help but admire your work.

group_1.textLeft: For the longest time, I was lost on what I @wanted to do.
I was so caught up on who I was as a @person...
I'm sure I’ve just been overthinking things, @and that's why I kept failing.

group_1.textRight: How do you feel now?

group_1.textLeft: I can concentrate perfectly!
I know now that I truly want to get along@with everyone else.
That’s who I am. @And I'm not going to disappear!

group_1.textRight: ...You seem to have made a full recovery.
Oh wow, your cakes look fantastic! @Once they're chilled, they’ll be ready to go!
In the meantime, you can try some of the snacks @we’ve provided in the coffee shop.
We’ve also supplied containers and ice packs @so you can take the cakes home with you.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you very much!

group_1.textRight: So there should be one cake for your friends, @and another for my teacher.
Why don't we eat the third one as soon as @it's chilled?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, that's just what I was thinking!
Last time, I gave the muffins to my friends before @I sampled them myself.
That was a total disaster.
Like you said, I think it was my big mistake...
So this time, I won't hesitate to see how it really @turned out!
All right, without further ado...

group_1.textRight: Bon appetit.

group_1.textLeft: ...This is wonderful!

group_1.textRight: It's remarkably good.
It's like something you could only get from @a bakery.
Now, I've been wondering... @This white frosting...
Is it meant to evoke snow?

group_1.textLeft: Yes! Like the fluffy parts on my hat!
It's like one of those Yukinko, isn't it?

group_1.textRight: Ah, that's what I'd guessed.
And now you don't even sound sad when you @mention the Yukinko.
Your confidence seems to have been fully @restored.

group_1.textLeft: It's all thanks to your Coordination, Yozuru!

group_1.textRight: Thank you very much.
...Well, then, I think it's time for me to tell you @the truth.

group_1.textLeft: What do you mean, the truth?

group_1.textRight: The truth is... I never performed a @Coordination to begin with.

group_1.textLeft: What...?

group_1.textRight: I simply used a Grief Seed on you to clean your @Soul Gem.
That was all I did.

group_1.textLeft: So you're saying I got my confidence back @because...

group_1.textRight: Because you believed in what I told you.

group_1.textLeft: Ehh?!

group_1.textRight: You answered your own self-doubts @and moved forward.
Applying your baking skills to their fullest @and making a wonderful cake.
That was all your power, not mine.
So I think you should have more faith in yourself, @Miss Leila.
